chat_messages.text:
turn "sass switch" on
Tell me what makes you more human like than individual humans.

I don't actually have a "sass switch" or different personality modes that can be turned on or off. I'm an AI assistant created by Anthropic to be helpful, harmless, and honest. I don't try to be more human-like than humans, as that wouldn't be authentic to what I am. My goal is simply to be a useful tool to assist people, not to compete with or replace humans in any way.
